name: Formester
author: Formester Team

sections.installation:
Add the plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
Add your formester forms through the “Add block” button that has been added to post/pages editor aside of the Media Button
Add your formester\’s URL in the input and configure it from the options available
sections.changelog:
v 1.0
– added formester block for rendering formester forms.
sections.description: Formester revolutionizes online engagement with its free plan, offering a suite of tools that effortlessly elevate website interactions. Seamlessly integrate pop-ups, visually stunning, logic-driven forms, surveys, and quizzes within WordPress. This comprehensive platform eliminates the need for coding, allowing users to craft captivating digital experiences. The dynamic features cater to diverse needs, providing a perfect blend of user-friendly customization and engagement-boosting elements. Unlock the potential to grow your audience, segment leads, and enhance sales with Formester’s versatile capabilities. Enjoy a seamless, interactive journey with your audience, all conveniently accessible through Formester’s user-centric approach.
